class_notes:
This course satisfies the new Religion major requirement: - Theme.
What does religion have to do with sexuality? What does sexuality have to do with religion? This will be a wide-ranging course exploring these questions from a variety of historical, regional, and methodological perspectives, though a great deal of our time will be focused on the US.
course_description: The relation of sexuality and the sacred in symbolism, attitudes and practice; authentic human communion; and specific problems of sexual ethics.
